text: <@UDU6KEBFB> Cool, let's rule out a property mapping issue next. Use the get ecomm settings endpoint to make sure Product 'product_image_url' is mapped to 'ip__ecomm_bridge__image_url'. (Get Ecommerce Settings endpoint here: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/ecommerce/v2/get-settings>)
Thanks <@UDU6KEBFB> That looks fine. Any chance you would share a real example of one of the image URLs you're using (maybe via DM if you'd prefer not to share with everyone in the channel)?

In the meantime, you may also like to spot check a few Product records using the Check sync status endpoint, to see if any errors are being returned relating to the image URL property: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/ecommerce/v2/check-sync-status>
thanks Zach... Do you think that the fact that we are in a test portal, for now, is the reason why images arent displayed?
<@UDU6KEBFB> Happy to help. I was more thinking down the lines that the image URLs themselves weren't valid. If you got supply an example, that might be helpful.
or the fact that we use a test portal?
